mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BLOG ( BLOG_NO, MEM_NO, BLOG_TITLE, BLOG_INTRODUCE, BLOG_IMG, BLOG_INTEREST, PLANT_PREFER ) VALUES ( SEQ_BLOG.NEXTVAL, #{ memNo }, #{ blogTitle }, #{ blogIntroduce }, #{ blogImg }, #{ blogInterest }, #{ plantPrefer } )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET BLOG_NO = SEQ_BLOG.CURRVAL WHERE MEM_NO = #{ memNo }
mapper.select: SELECT BLOG_NO, MEM_NO, BLOG_TITLE, BLOG_INTRODUCE, BLOG_IMG, BLOG_INTEREST, PLANT_PREFER FROM TB_BLOG WHERE BLOG_NO = #{ blogNo }
